p: The extracts of Jacaranda copaia, Oenocarpus bataua, Parkia pendula, Protium crassipetalum, Tapirira guianensis, Uncaria guianensis, Vismia cayennensis, Vismia guianensis, Vochysia ferrug√≠nea, Waltheria indica, and Warscewiczia coccinea inhibited the kinase, but not mycobacterial growth. Nevertheless, identification of the kinase inhibiting metabolites could provide new lead compounds for the design of new drugs.
